title: How to Make Welsh Rabbit

steps.headline: Spray the top of double boiler with nonstick cooking spray, if desired.
Cook and stir until cheese melts.
Serve at once over hot toast.

text: Spray the top of double boiler with nonstick cooking spray, if desired.  Grate cheese, if needed.  Beat egg.  Add cheese to double boiler.  Add milk.  Cook and stir until cheese melts.  Mix in remaining ingredients.  Cook 5 minutes  Serve at once over hot toast.
